record.properties: Name = "Dataenvironment"
Height = 428 Width = 733 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "Catalogo de Recepciones de Materiales" Name = "Formamsl1" Marco.Name = "Marco"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Activate * activate
Thisform.Consultar() ENDPROC PROCEDURE Init * Init if not opendbf ('provedor','Numprov')Or; not opendbf ('docum','tiponum') or ; not opendbf ('movim','tiponumpar') or; not opendbf ('arts','numart') or; not opendbf ('usuarios','numuser') or; not opendbf ('Almacen','numAlm')
return .F. endif
WITH THISFORM
*Variables .leefecha1.Setvalue(date(year(date()),month(date()),1)) .leefecha2.Setvalue(Date())
*Cursor Create Cursor Tempg (; numdoc C(10),; Fecha D(8),; Numprov C(10),; NomProv C(30),; NomCli C(30),; Importe N(12,2),; Impuesto1 N(12,2),; Divisa C(1),; NumProy C(30),; STATUS C(20),; Total N(12,2),; DocAnt C(10))
*Indice para ordenar Index on Numdoc Tag NumDoc Set order to numdoc
* Consultar .Consultar()
* Colorear rengl贸n activo. thisform.activerecno=0 .SetAll('DynamicBackColor', 'iif(Recno("tempg")==ThisForm.ActiveRecno, RGB(255,255,200), RGB(255,255,255))', 'Column')
* Muestra mensaje si no se encontro soporte If Reccount('tempg')==0 Alerta('No se encontr贸 informacion') Return Endif
EndWith
ENDPROC PROCEDURE consultar * Consultar WITH THISFORM
Sele tempg Zap
* Variables locales vFecha1 = .LeeFecha1.Value vFecha2 = .LeeFecha2.Value cNumprov = .Leeprov1.Numprov.value cNumalm = .Leealm1.Numalm.value
*consultar if Not SqlMSL ('Temp' ,' Select Docum.numdoc, Docum.tipodoc, Docum.fecha , Docum.status,Docum.descuento, '+; ' Docum.numcli, Docum.NumProv, Docum.importe,Docum.divisa, Docum.impuesto1, Docum.DocAnt, Docum.Numalm '+; ' from docum where docum.tipodoc = "RM" and docum.Status <> 1 and '+; ' Between(DOCUM.Fecha,m.Val1, m.Val2) And '+; Iif(Empty(cNumprov) ,".T." , " Docum.NumProv = m.Val3 ")+ ' And ' + ; Iif(Empty(cNumalm) ,".T." , " Docum.NumAlm = m.Val4 ") + ; ' order by Numdoc ', vFecha1 ,vFecha2 ,cNumprov, cNumalm) return endif
* Pasando valors a Tempg Sele Temp SCAN
cStatus = ''
* Do Case para Estatus DO CASE
CASE temp.status = 11 cstatus = 'Parcial'
CASE Temp.status = 12 cstatus = 'Completa'
ENDCASE
sele Provedor = Seek(temp.Numprov,'Provedor','NUMPROV') cNomProv= Provedor.NomProv
Sele tempg Appen Blank Replace numdoc with Temp.numdoc,; Fecha with Temp.Fecha,; Nomprov with cNomprov,; status with cStatus,; Importe with Temp.importe,; Impuesto1 with Temp.impuesto1,; Divisa with Temp.divisa,; Total with (Temp.importe+temp.impuesto1)-temp.descuento,; DocAnt with Allt(Temp.DocAnt)
Sele temp
ENDSCAN
*Muestra los datos de tempoca .LockScreen = .t. With ThisForm.Grid1 .RecordSourceType = 1 Select tempg go bott for i= 1 to 15 if not bof() skip -1 endif endfor
.RecordSource = 'Tempg' .Column1.ControlSource = 'Allt(tempg.NUMDOC)' .Column2.ControlSource = 'MEXDATE2(tempg.FECHA)' .Column3.ControlSource = 'Tempg.Nomprov' .Column4.ControlSource = 'Tempg.Importe' .Column5.ControlSource = 'Tempg.Impuesto1' .Column6.ControlSource = 'Tempg.Divisa' .Column7.ControlSource = 'Tempg.Status' .Column8.ControlSource = 'Tempg.Total' .Column9.ControlSource = 'Tempg.DocAnt' .setfocus .refresh EndWith .LockScreen = .f.
ENDWITH ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 620 Left = 930 Height = 25 Width = 60 Caption = "Agregar" Enabled = .F. TabIndex = 1 Visible = .F. Name = "Boton1"
Top = 15 Left = 150 Height = 25 Width = 60 Caption = "Visualizar" TabIndex = 3 Name = "Boton4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *Modificar Sele tempg cFolio =''
cFolio = padl(allt(tempg.numdoc),10)
doform('Recepmat',2,recno(), cFolio) ENDPROC

Top = 15 Left = 210 Height = 25 Width = 60 Caption = "Cancelar" TabIndex = 4 Name = "Boton3"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *Modificar Sele tempg cFolio ='' cFolio = padl(allt(tempg.numdoc),10)
doform('Recepmat',3,recno(), cFolio) ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 19 Left = 379 Width = 96 Height = 24 TabIndex = 1 ZOrderSet = 5 Name = "Leefecha1" Container1.Name = "Container1" fecha.Name = "fecha" Buscar.Name = "Buscar"
Top = 17 Left = 290 Height = 23 Width = 23 Picture = r:\sait\cia008\excel.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 14 ZOrderSet = 6 Name = "Excel"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
if not opendbf('CIA') return .f. endif
sele tempg
With Thisform * Mada a Excel la consulta cNomcia = Allt(Cia.NOMCIA) cTitulo = .Caption cColumnas = '' cMascaras = '' OpenExcel(cNomCia,cTitulo,cColumnas,cMascaras)
EndWith
Sele cia use ENDPROC

PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange LPARAMETERS nColIndex
* Colorear rengl贸n if select('tempg')>0 Select Tempg ThisForm.ActiveRecno = Recno() this.Refresh()
endif
ENDPROC

If nKeycode = 13
Sele tempg cFolio =''

ENDIF ENDPROC
